files.name: main.py
files.content:
startingBottles = int (input ( "How many starting bottles?"))

while ( startingBottles < 1):
    print ("You must enter 1 or more bottles.")
    startingBottles = int (input ( "How many starting bottles?"))

while ( startingBottles >= 1 ):
    print ( startingBottles, "bottles of Slurm on the wall.")
    print ( startingBottles, "bottles of Slurm..")
    print ( "Take one down, pass it around..")
    print ( startingBottles-1, " bottles of Slurm on the wall.")
    startingBottles = startingBottles - 1
print ( "No more bottles of Slurm on the wall!")
